title: Researching Art Institute Artworks
copy: To locate information on artworks in the Art Institute of Chicago’s collection, start with the museum’s collection database, which often includes a publication and exhibition history in addition to images of and other information about the particular work. AIC Collectio﻿ns Online A database with complete holdings is accessible at the reference desk. Check the following resources available at the libraries: Catalogs of museum or department collections (including our digital catalogs ) Exhibition catalogs World Painting Index (Open Shelf: ND45 .H38 1977) Oxford Art Online Museum Studies (1966–2011) Please visit the reference desk for further assistance.
